name: Beer Cheese
description: Burger served on a pretzel bun with beer cheese dip, bacon bits, croutons, and green onions

name: Bacon
description: Two slices of peppered bacon, mayo, pickles, provolone cheese, tomatoes, and shredded lettuce

name: Crispy
description: Peppered bacon, fried egg, pulled pork, BBQ sauce, and American cheese, topped with onion rings and splash of red hot sauce

name: Jalapeño
description: Spicy combination of pepper jack cheese, peppered bacon,and sliced jalapeños

name: Guacamole
description: Juicy burger topped with fresh guacamole, jalapeños, pepper jack cheese, and spicy sauce

name: Macaroni & Cheese
description: Burger topped with extra cheesy macaroni and bacon bits
